name: PROPHSIER
overview:
Prophsier delivers consultancy services to overseas companies who wish to expand their operations and open up a new sales channel within the MENA region. We have a team of specialized sales experts who can help Companies distribute their products and services and build a brand name in the region. Through its recognized digital marketing brand, Megillion, Prophsier provides digital marketing services and have a team of art work and design experts who can help in spreading the message on a bigger scale.

Prophsier is considered one of the leading Value Added Distributors (VAD) across the Middle East and North Africa. Our business strategy is built around key drivers; these include demand creation/evangelization of emerging technologies with end users, and enablement for education, training and technical competence to support these end users. We provide marketing collateral, access to online sales tools like product catalogues, brochures, local case studies and customer references. We use online tools to conduct regular sales and technology updates through webinars and video conferencing.

Uniquely in the region, our combination of full support for our customers and market-leading solutions from emerging technologies provides both our partners and customers with the full confidence to invest in integrated next-generation IT and networking solutions.
